data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jiang, Xuan-Kong, Guo, Xuan, Yu, Zhi-Gang, Chen, Hui-Ming (2017): First description of the male of the eyeless spider Draconarius tortus Chen, Zhu & Kim 2008 from China (Araneae: Agelenidae: Coelotinae). Zootaxa 4294 (1): 141-144, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4294.1.11|1 occurrence
